description: Dashboard to visualize data from the SolarEdge Cloud API, scraped and stored in InfluxDb

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I_AC_Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] == "${site}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sn"] == "${sn}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I_L1_AC_Voltage" or r["_field"] == "I_L2_AC_Voltage" or r["_field"] == "I_L3_AC_Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] == "${site}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sn"] == "${sn}")
  |> drop(columns: ["site", "sn"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "date"
import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Warsaw")
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit:1d), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wh")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn", "host"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> group(columns: ["_value"], mode: "except")
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["_value", "_time"], mode: "except")
  |> max()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["sn"] == "${sn}" and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Energy_WH")
|> spread()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["sn"] == "${sn}" and r["_field"] == "I_AC_Energy_WH")
|> last()
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "site", "sn"])

import "date"
import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Warsaw")
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit:1d), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] == "${site}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "feedin" or r["type"] == "production" or r["type"] == "selfconsumption")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn", "host"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> group(columns: ["_value"], mode: "except")
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["_value", "_time"], mode: "except")

import "date"
import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Warsaw")
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit:1d), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] == "${site}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "consumption" or r["type"] == "purchased" or r["type"] == "selfconsumption")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn", "host"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> group(columns: ["_value"], mode: "except")
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["_value", "_time"], mode: "except")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w")
|> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "site", "sn"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
|> yield(name: "mean")

current = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: today(), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w" and r["type"] == "production")
|> map(fn:(r) => ({_time: r._time, "production current": r._value}))

|> yield(name: "current")

best = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: 2023-06-03, stop: 2023-06-04)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w" and r["type"] == "production")
|> map(fn:(r) => ({_time: r._time, "production best": r._value}))
|> timeShift(duration: duration(v: (uint(v: today()) - uint(v: 2023-06-03))))
|> yield(name: "best")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "panel" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] != "181087139" and r["id"] != "181087208")
|> max()
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field", "_measurement", "site"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "panel" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] != "181087139" and r["id"] != "181087208")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field", "_measurement", "site"])

import "date"
import "experimental"
current = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "panel" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] != "181087139" and r["id"] != "181087208")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
|> map(fn:(r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, id: r.id+"-current"}))
|> experimental.alignTime(alignTo: v.timeRangeStart)
|> yield(name: "current")

best = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: 2023-06-04T22:00:00Z, stop: 2023-06-05T21:59:59Z)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "panel" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["_field"] == "w")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] != "181087139" and r["id"] != "181087208")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
|> map(fn:(r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, id: r.id+"-best"}))
|> experimental.alignTime(alignTo: v.timeRangeStart)
|> yield(name: "best")

panels.title: Per panel power - best day comparison

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data" and r["site"] == "${site}" and r["sn"] == "${sn}" and r["_field"] == "I_Temp")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
|> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I_groundFaultResistance")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "site", "sn"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I_L1_AC_Voltage" or r["_field"] == "I_L2_AC_Voltage" or r["_field"] == "I_L3_AC_Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] == "${site}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sn"] == "${sn}")
  |> drop(columns: ["site", "sn"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I_L1_AC_Freq" or r["_field"] == "I_L2_AC_Freq" or r["_field"] == "I_L3_AC_Freq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] == "${site}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sn"] == "${sn}")
  |> drop(columns: ["site", "sn"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "site",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: site
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "site",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "sn",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: sn
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "sn",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

title: SolarEdge Cloud
